*Complimentary USA Today each weekday morning
*Outdoor pool/whirlpool/Fitness Center
*24 hour complimentary Business Center

With our modern amenities and thoughtful design, the Best Western Plus Addison/Dallas Hotel will stand out among other hotels in Dallas,TX. We also have an in-house fitness room, so you can keep up your workout routine while you're on the road. results.name: Hyatt  House Dallas/Addison
results.description: ABOUT THE HOTEL: Introducing HYATT house Dallas/Addison is conveniently located in the heart of the North Dallas business corridor, just minutes from Dallas/Forth Worth International Airport and Love Field. The Dallas/Addison hotel offers travelers access to popular tourist destinations including Galleria Mall, AT&T Cowboys Stadium, the Dallas Museum of Art and the Dallas World Aquarium. For the business traveler, the Dallas/Addison hotel is centrally located to the corporate offices for American Airlines, Boeing, Cardinal Health and Pepsi. For college students and their guests, the hotel is convenient to the University of Texas at Dallas and Southern Methodist University. SLEEPING ROOMS: NEWLY RENOVATED 2011. The Hyatt House Dallas/Addison is an all Suite Hotel. All rooms feature these suite amenities: - Separate One & Two private bedroom(s) with private bath(s) - Spacious living area with a sleeper sofa and Flat Screen HD TV - Fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator with ice maker, microwave, full size stove and oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal and coffee maker - Full size desk(s) with data port, complimentary WiFi and personal voice mail - Hair dryers - Iron and Ironing Board. HOTEL HIGHLIGHTS: - Complimentary Parking - Full Complimentary Hot Breakfast Buffet - Kitchen and BAR - Fully Equipped Business Center - Laundry/Valet - 2 Meeting Rooms. ON SITE ACTIVITIES: - Fitness Center - Outdoor Grilling - Outdoor Pool/Heated Spa - Recreation/Sports Court - Heated Spa. OFF SITE ACTIVITIES: - Galleria Mall: 2 1/2 mile - Addison Circle Park: 1/2 mile - American Airlines Center: 12 1/2 miles - Cavanaugh Flight Museum: 1 3/4 miles - Six Flags Over Texas: 25 3/4 miles - Dallas Cowboys Stadium: 27 1/4 miles - The Village On The Parkway: 1/2 mile - 300 Dallas: 1 1/2 miles - Addison Theatre Centre/Water Tower Theatre: 1/2 mile - Dallas Museum of Art: 13 miles - Dallas World Aquarium: 13 miles - Sixth Floor Museum: 13 miles - Dallas Zoo: 15 3/4 miles - Nokia Live: 24 1/2 miles - Texas Ranger Stadium: 26 1/2 miles

results.name: Residence Inn Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive
results.description:
See why so many travelers make Residence Inn Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive their hotel of choice when visiting Addison. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Dallas Residence Inn features a 24 hour front desk, express check-in and check-out, and newspaper. In addition, as a valued Residence Inn Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
While in Addison, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Dallas Residence Inn, including Texas de Brazil (0.3 mi), La Madeleine (0.6 mi), and Chamberlain's Steak and Chop House (0.7 mi).
Addison is also known for some great parks, including Addison Circle Park, Vitruvian Park, and Bosque Park, which are not too far from Residence Inn Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive.
At Residence Inn Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Addison.

results.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Dallas North - Addison, an IHG Hotel
results.description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Dallas North-Addison! Experience exceptional comfort and unmatched hospitality in the heart of Addison, Texas. Our hotel is the perfect choice for both business and leisure travelers, offering a range of amenities and convenient access to local attractions.From the moment you step into our modern and stylish lobby, you'll feel welcomed by our friendly staff who are dedicated to making your stay memorable. Relax in our spacious guest rooms and suites, featuring contemporary decor, plush bedding, and all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay.Start your day right with our complimentary Express Start breakfast, featuring a delicious selection of hot and cold options. Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and make use of our 24-hour business center for all your work needs. Unwind and rejuvenate at our outdoor pool or maintain your fitness routine in our well-equipped fitness center.

results.name: Holiday Inn & Suites Dallas-Addison, an IHG Hotel
results.description:
Our hotel's key location is just minutes away from the Galleria Mall with an indoor ice-skating rink and upscale shopping. The offices of several Fortune 500 Companies are in the vicinity our Holiday Inn & Suites Dallas-Addison for your meetings. Addison hosts several cultural festivals annually including Taste of Addison, KaBoom Town, Addison After Dark, Vitruvian Park Events and Oktoberfest a German Fare with a side of Texas Flair and is known as the "Restaurant Capital of Texas" with more than 180 different restaurant allowing for a variety of entertainment options.

Start your day off right in our lobby restaurant The Addison with a hot breakfast and on-site Fitness Center. Take a stroll around the Kyle Warren Park and visit the Perot Museum in Dallas, or The Star in Frisco. Return to the hotel to completely relax in the evening with a dip in our outdoor pool or enjoy dinner at The Addison or one of many walking distance restaurants-the choice is yours.

results.description:
Welcome to Americas Best Value Inn, your Addison "home away from home." Americas Best Value Inn aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Rooms at Americas Best Value Inn offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. Free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Americas Best Value Inn, free parking is available.
When you're feeling hungry, be sure to check out Ferrari's Italian Villa & Chop House, Andiamo Italian Bar & Grill, and Antonio Ristorante, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you're looking for things to do, you can check out Addison Circle Park (1.2 mi), which is a popular attraction amongst tourists, and it is within walking distance.
Americas Best Value Inn puts the best of Addison at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

results.description: Staybridge Suites Dallas - Addison welcomes guests with Texas hospitality Ideally located on the North Dallas Tollway near Dallas - Ft. Worth International Airport (DFW) and Concentra Medical Center, our extended stay Dallas area accommodations provide guests with the comforts and conveniences of home, as well as easy access to top Texas attractions and businesses. Our pet friendly Dallas, Texas hotel's long term guests can enjoy visiting the Cavanaugh Flight Museum, attending shows at the Addison Improv Comedy Club and shopping at the Galleria Mall. Famous attractions such as the downtown Dallas World Aquarium and Irving's Mustangs of Las Colinas are also in close proximity to our accommodations. Business travelers appreciate our extended stay Dallas - Addison, Texas hotel near companies such as Sun Microsystems, Symantec and CompUSA. To accommodate our guests' business needs, we offer 400 sq. ft. of meeting space, a 24-hour business center and free high-speed Internet access. During your stay, we invite you to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle services and laundry facilities. A pool and whirlpool, Fitness Center and a barbecue pavilion are also provided for your benefit. We offer a free breakfast buffet daily, and we host community-oriented Sundowner Receptions Tuesday - Thursday.
